main: ^Like it?!?! It was perfect!!! Exactly what I needed for the days work. I owe you one!
^Since that was so good... how about I give you free lifts?
^Yeah! As long as you keep brigning me some of that amazing food you cook up, the lifts are completely on me!
^And I'll tell you what! I can show you around George and Oudtshoorn to get you started!
^Great places for foraging, I've heard that the people around those areas are pretty cool aswell. Very big into food! I'm sure you'll make it big there!
^Here's a map aswell... just point me in the direction and ill take you there!
^Press 'M' to open and close your map
